name: telegraph-image
description: Free image hosting solution using Cloudflare Pages and Telegram Bot API

scripts.ci-test: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:8080 && mocha --exit"
scripts.start: npx wrangler pages dev dist --binding BASIC_USER=admin --binding BASIC_PASS=123 --port 8080 --persist-to ./data
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
